Package it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.tiles.tiles_objects

package it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.model.tiles.tiles_objects
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BatteryStorageCreator
    The BatteryStorageCreator class represents a "Battery Storage" tile creator.
    BatteryStorageTile
    This type of tile will represent the battery storages
    CabinCreator
    The CabinCreator class represents a "Cabin" tile creator.
    CabinTile
    The class represent the cabin tile that will be inserted in the ship.
    CannonBaseTile
    This class represents the base functionality for cannon tiles.
    CannonCreator
    The CannonCreator class represents a "Cannon" tile creator.
    CannonTile
    This class represents a single cannon tile.
    CargoHoldCreator
    The CargoHoldCreator class represents a "Cargo Hold" tile creator.
    CargoHoldTile
    The class represent the cargo holds that will be inserted in the ship
    Connector
    This class represent the different types and direction of the connectors for the tiles.
    DoubleCannonCreator
    The DoubleCannonCreator class represents a "Double Cannon" tile creator.
    DoubleCannonTile
    This class represents a double cannon tile.
    DoubleMotorCreator
    The DoubleMotorCreator class represents a "Double Motor" tile creator.
    DoubleMotorTile
    This class represent the double motor tiles that will be included in the ship
    MotorBaseTile
    This class represent the double motor tiles that will be included in the ship
    MotorCreator
    The MotorCreator class represents a "Motor" tile creator.
    MotorTile
    This class represent a single motor tile.
    ShieldCreator
    The ShieldCreator class represents a "Shield Generator" tile creator.
    ShieldTile
    This class represent the shield generator tile that will be included in the ship
    StartingCabinCreator
    The StartingCabinCreator class represents a "Starting Cabin" tile creator.
    StartingCabinTile
    The class will represent the central tile in each ship.
    StructuralModuleCreator
    The StructuralModuleCreator class represents a "Structural Module" tile creator.
    StructuralModuleTile
    This class represent the structural module that will be included in the ship
    Tile
    This class represent a generic tile that will be used for the building of the ship.
    TileCreator
    The TileCreator is an abstract class representing a card creator.
    VitalSupportCreator
    The VitalSupportCreator class represents a "Vital Support" tile creator.
    VitalSupportTile
    This class represent the vital support modules that will be included in the ship.
